original_text: But Naomi said to her two daughters-in-law, “Go, return each of you to her mother's house. May the Lord deal kindly with you, as you have dealt with the dead and with me.
korean_text: 나오미가 두 며느리에게 이르되 너희는 각기 너희 어머니의 집으로 돌아가라 너희가 죽은 자들과 나를 선대한 것 같이 여호와께서 너희를 선대하시기를 원하며

sentences.original_text: But Naomi said to her two daughters-in-law,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나오미가 그의 두 며느리에게 이르되,

sentences.original_text: return each of you to her mother's house.
May the Lord deal kindly with you,
as you have dealt with the dead and with me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 죽은 자와 내게 행한 것 같이.
